questions.question: Welcome! Online contact us form template
Hi, what's your name
And your last name?
So, what store are you reporting from?
And what day is it?
Great! Now, how many items did you sell today?
Before you go, we'd love to hear your thoughts about today's sales
Interested in our product? Answer a few short questions and we'll get in touch with you!
First up, what should we call you?
Cool! And your surname?
Great. Now what's your email?
And your phone number?
Last question, what product are you interested in?
All good! We've got that. We'll be in touch soon!
Employee Self Evaluation
questions.description_label: This typeform will help you self-appraise your performance at work. Make sure to discuss your answers with your manager in your next performance review.

questions.question: What is your first name?
And what is your last name?
questions.description_label: This typeform will help you self-appraise your performance at work. Make sure to discuss your answers with your manager in your next performance review.

questions.question: What is your department?
questions.description_label: asdfasfd

questions.question: What is your job title?
Who is your supervisor?
When was your last performance review?
You will now be shown a series of statements about your job performance and the way you work.
questions.description_label: Please read them carefully and rate the extent to which you agree or disagree with each of them.

questions.question: I deliver high quality work thoroughly and with care, following established processes and procedures.
I complete my work within agreed timeframes and specifications. I never miss a deadline or delay a project.
My work is meaningful and contributes to my department's high-level goals and objectives.
I communicate well and clearly.
I proactively help others.
I am committed and passionate.
I am creative and open to innovation.
I am pragmatic, tenacious and bold.
I am pragmatic, tenacious and bold.
I accomplished all of the goals listed in my last performance review.
What have been your most significant accomplishments since your last performance review?
questions.description_label: Make sure to also describe what you would have liked to have done, but were unable to.

questions.question: And what goals would you like to set yourself for the coming evaluation period?
questions.description_label: Make sure to describe the actions you will take to accomplish them.

questions.question: Which professional development activities would you find helpful for improving your job performance and accomplishing your goals?
How could your manager better support you and increase your job satisfaction?
questions.description_label: Consider, for example, additional resources or tools you would like to have access to.

questions.question: Finally, what is your email address?
questions.description_label: We will use this to send you your answers so you can review them later.

questions.question: Interested in joining?
questions.description_label: We meet on the second Saturday of every month!

questions.question: Thanks for joining! What is your first name?
Now, what is your last name?
How about your address?
questions.description_label: We need this to send you some updates.

questions.question: And would you mind providing us with your telephone number?
questions.description_label: We'll use this to let you know about any upcoming meetings.

questions.question: Thanks for that! How would you rate your knowledge of this topic?
What do you expect from this event
Thanks for applying! Will see you soon.
This is the registration form. Feel free to change the title here
Let's start with your first name.
And your last name?
What email address can we reach you at? This is only to get in touch, not to send spam.
Lastly, what country do you live in?
questions.description_label: We meet on the second Saturday of every month!

questions.question: We'd love to hear what you thought of the event!
So how would you rate the event overall?
Is there anything you think we couldn't have done better?
Thanks for your honesty, we appreciate your feedback.
questions.description_label: Which parts of the event did you enjoy?

questions.question: Great, we'll keep that in mind!
questions.description_label: Now for a few rating questions.

questions.question: How well was the event organized?
And how helpful were the event staff?
What did you think of the services we provide?
Finally, would you recommend our event to a friend?
Hope to see you at the next one!
What's it like working here?
questions.description_label: We're always looking to improve your work experience. Let us know what we're doing right and if anything grinds your gears.

questions.question: How do you feel when you come into work?
Would you recommend working here to your friends?
OK, now we're going to show you a series of statements. Let us know how much you agree with each.
Hey there! We'd love to learn a bit more about how you use our product in your day-to-day work. Could you spare 10 minutes to tell us a bit about your business and how our product fits in?
Let's start simple - what's your first name?
It's good to see you! What's your last name?
And what company do you work for?
Thanks, We want to show other user's how different people are using our product to get things done. We like what you're doing and think your work can help inspire others. :)
In a sentence or two, tell us what your company does.
Before you found our solution, what problem were you facing?
questions.description_label: In other words what led you to try our products?

questions.question: Which features and integrations have you been using and why?
What are some of the concrete ways the tool has helped you? Please list a few below.
questions.description_label: This section is designed to show the value we're bringing to your company. We'd love to share metrics like hours saved, money saved, big wins you've achieved, etc.

questions.question: What tips do you have for others using the software?
Thanks for sharing, we really appreciate it. Just before you go, we have some  final things to clear up - should take a couple of minutes
Could you let us know your role at your company
And what's your email address?
questions.description_label: This is so we can contact you if you have follow-up questions. We'll also use it to let you know when we publish the case study.

questions.question: Thank's Would you mind uploading a picture of yourself for us to use in the article?
questions.description_label: A high resolution in portrait or landscape mode would be great

questions.question: And do you have any cool pictures of the team, your workplace, or company products we could use in the article?
questions.description_label: A high resolution in portrait or landscape mode would be great

questions.question: We may wish to include these images outside of the case study article (e.g. for social media, testimonials, marketing campaigns). Are you OK with us doing this?
Hello. Welcome to the team. Help us improve our onboarding process by answering these quick questions about how it went for you.
First up, can you tell us how long you’ve been with us?
questions.description_label: Remember, all your answers are anonymouse so please make sure the info you give us is accurate and honest.

questions.question: Great! Now, to begin with, we’d like to ask about how you found our recruitment process
How long did the recruitment process take, from when you first applied until you got accepted for the job?
On a scale of 1-5, show how much you agree with the statement:
questions.description_label: The recruitment process was very professional.

questions.question: On a scale of 1-5, show how much you agree with the statement:
questions.description_label: During the recruitment process, I learned about the company and my role.

questions.question: Any suggestions for ways we could improve the recruitment process?
Ok, good to know! Now, we have a few questions about the equipment and resources you need to do your job
On a scale of 1-5, show how much you agree with the statement:
questions.description_label: The equipment or resources I need were ready for me when I started my job. Computers, tools, materials, etc.

questions.question: On a scale of 1-5, show how much you agree with the statement:
questions.description_label: After onboarding, I feel confident using the equipment and resources that my job requires.

questions.question: Do you feel that you're provided with all the equipment and resources you need to do your job well?
Oh! In that case, what equipment or resources do you feel are lacking?
Excellent, thanks! You’re about halfway through the survey now. his time, a few questions about how the onboarding process has left you feeling about your role
questions.description_label: On a scale of 1-5, show how much you agree with the 5 statements

questions.question: I’ve received adequate training to do my role.
The information I received during training/onboarding was at the right level for me.
Now that I’ve finished the onboarding process, I’m feeling productive.
I now have a clear understanding of what is expected of me in this role.
I now have an understanding of how I can expect my role to develop in the future.
This feedback is really helping, thanks! Just a few more questions. Now we want to ask about how the onboarding process has left you feeling about the company
questions.description_label: On a scale of 1-5, show how much you agree with the 5 statements

questions.question: I feel welcome here.
I feel like I fit in here.
I can see myself still working here in a year’s time.
I have a clear idea of how my role contributes to the main mission(s) of the company.
Working here is what I hoped it would be.
Thanks! Just 2 more questions to go.Overall, how would you rate your onboarding experience with us?
questions.description_label: Think about duration of the training, clarity of the information, professionality, etc.

questions.question: Ok. And finally, please let us know anything we could do to improve the onboarding experience.
Thanks for taking time out to tell us more about you and your beachwear preferences
Let's start by finding out how beachwear aware you are
How often do you use beachwear products?
What beachwear brands, if any, can you think of?
When did you last buy a beachwear product?
Great. So, let's hear your thoughts about Origama
If Origama® were a person, which of the following adjectives do you feel would best describe their personality?
questions.description_label: Choose as many as you like

questions.question: Thanks for checking out the new Origama® Sun Seat. How interested are you in the product on a scale of one to five?
questions.description_label: Choose as many as you like

questions.question: What appeals to you most about the Sun Seat?
questions.description_label: Give as much detail as you can based on what you've seen so far.

questions.question: And what puts you off it?
questions.description_label: Don't hold back. We can take it!

questions.question: Thanks. Which of the following would influence your decision the most if you were to buy a Sun Seat?
You're doing great; we're about halfway through now, Let's find out what you think about the Sun Seat's pricing.
At what USD price would you begin to think the Sun Seat to be a great buy for the money?
questions.description_label: Enter number's only

questions.question: And at what price would you think it's too cheap to be good quality?
OK—and finally, at what price is it getting expensive, but still not out of the question?
Thank you. We're almost there—just some questions about you.
What's your age range?This question is required?
and your early income?
choices: G. I prefer not to answer

questions.question: What country were you born in
What's your current employment status?
Whats the highest level of education you've completed?
choices: H. I prefer not to answer

questions.question: If you're considering buying a Sun Seat, enter your email address and we'll let you know when it makes it to market.
questions.description_label: Don't worry your email is safe with us.

questions.question: Are you the one?
So you want to win a trip to Berlin?
What does your perfect day with friends look like?
questions.description_label: Pssst: let your imagination do the heavy lifting, because we make the decision based on this question alone.

questions.question: Good answer. Now, what's your full name?
questions.description_label: Don't use your imagination for this one.

questions.question: Great. Before we say auf wiedersehen, please link to your Twitter/LinkedIn/Facebook profile, and we'll let you know next week if you're a finalist.
Get ready to pack your bags. Or to buy some consoling ice cream. You'll know next week.
Help us provide treatment, care and support to vulnerable children.
questions.description_label: Your donation will be fully tax deductible.

questions.question: What's your first name?
And what's your last name?
Thanks. Were really grateful for your generosity.How much are you willing to donate today?
Now we just need to take some contact details so we can keep a record of your donation.

And can we get your phone number?
What's your street address?
And what's your postal/zip code?
What city is that in?
Would you like to subscribe to our newsletter?
questions.description_label: You'll get regular updates on the impact your donation is making if you agree to this.

questions.question: Would you like to volunteer to help with fundraising?
questions.description_label: If so, well be in touch with details of how you can help us further our cause.

questions.question: Would you mind letting us know how you heard about us?
Is there anything else you'd like to share with us before we wrap this up?
So finally, please confirm your donation of and enter your credit card information below.
Thank you very much, . Your donation has been made successfully. Your contribution will make a big difference to children's lives.
questions.description_label: Help us spread the word by sharing this using the buttons below...

questions.question: Need words? You've come to the write place. Tell us a bit more about the content you need created and we'll get writing.
First up, what's your name?
Now, what department are you from?
Nice, now what kind of content do you need?
I see.. Could you tell us in a few sentences what you need?
Any assets that might help us?
Nearly there. What's the due date for this task?
And how urgent would you say it is?
Great , that's been swished over to our copywriting Trello board.
Thanks for agreeing to give us some feedback.
questions.description_label: This questionnaire should take no longer than 3 minutes.

questions.question: Can you describe your first impression of our website in three words?
What did you like about our website?
And what didn't you like?
Now, what was the main reason you visited our website?
And how likely are you to return?
Before you go, would you mind leaving your email address?
questions.description_label: We'll use this to get in touch with you if we have any further questions

questions.question: Can you help us make this course better for future students?
Thanks so much. So, what's the name of the course you took?
questions.description_label: The course ID would work, too

questions.question: When did you finish this course?
And where did you take the course?
Did the campus live up to your expectations?
Alright, these questions are about the course design.
In your opinion, how clear were the course objectives?
And did the structure and sequence of the lectures make sense?
The course contents were illustrated with…
And the level of the course was…
How theoretical was the course?
'The course exposed you to new knowledge and practices.' Do you agree?
Overall, how much did this course meet your expectations?
Alright, moving on to the teaching and materials.
'The lecturers were clear and easy to understand.'
'The teaching aids were used well.'
'The course material you got (books and stuff) was enough.'
'The teachers were enthusiastic and encouraging.'
The best thing about the teachers was...
The worst thing about the teachers was...
Do you think the course objectives were realized?
Would you recommend this course to someone you know?
All things considered, how would you rate this course?
If you could change one thing about thi course, what would it be?
And finally, can we get your email?
questions.description_label: It's just to follow-up, not for spam.

questions.question: St. Beardyman's University Course Evaluation Form
Hello! What year of study are you in?
Great. And what is your major?
Thank you. Now, onto the course details. What's your course code?
And what is your instructor's full name?
About the evaluation
questions.description_label: The information you provide will be used by the instructor for improving course structure and teaching. Your input will make a difference. Please take the time to respond thoughtfully.

questions.question: The course objectives were clearly articulated.
The assignments were engaging.
The evaluation methods used in this course were fair.
This course made an important contribution to my program of study.
The instructor was available to help students outside of class time, whether in person, by email, or via online meeting.
In general, the level of difficulty in this course was appropriate.
Thank you for answering the form. Do you have anything to add before we submit??
The annual FormConf is almost here. Want to come?
Great, can we get your full name?
questions.description_label: We'll print this on your event pass.

questions.question: And what's your email address?
questions.description_label: We'll only use it to send you a confirmation.

questions.question: Are you planning on staying for the afterparty?
questions.description_label: We have a surprise guest lined up...

questions.question: And do you have any food allergies we should know about?
And finally, would you mind telling us how you heard about the FormConf?
That's everything. We'll send you an email confirmation with some details a few minutes after you submit this form. We hope you're excited as we are :)
We're looking for a Growth Hacker. Are you the right person for the job?
Before we start, can we get your first name?
Nice to meet you, and thanks for taking the time to apply. Here's what the job involves:
questions.description_label: In this cross-functional role, you’ll be optimizing our users' journey across all stages of our marketing funnel. You'll be part of our product team and work closely with marketing and engineering. You'll also be responsible for finding customer pain points, running A/B tests, interpreting results, and presenting them to management. Improving conversion rates at each stage of the funnel will be your bread and butter. All sound good to you?

questions.question: Glad to hear it. OK, here's our description of the ideal person for this job.
questions.description_label: Your ability to analyze customer behavior through qualitative data and number crunching is outstanding. Your Excel skills are superb and your experience with Optimizely, KISSmetrics and Google Analytics is unrivaled. You're also passionate about startups and technology. You're subscribed to the best CRO and SaaS metrics blogs.

questions.question: So far, so good?
questions.description_label: Now we'd like to ask a few questions about you.

questions.question: How would you rate your experience and knowledge of running split tests?This question is required.
And how would you rate your copywriting ability?
questions.description_label: Don't worry, you don't have to be a copy wizard for this job.

questions.question: Next, what do you think of this statement: 'Finding the 'Aha!' moment on the customer journey is the first and most important job of a growth hacker'
And why do you think that?
What result are you most proud of?
questions.description_label: This is your chance to wow us. Don't be shy.

questions.question: What makes you want to work at Cloud Metrics?
And that's it! Just a few personal details and we'll have all the info we need. Can we get the link to your LinkedIn profile?
Your full name too.
And what's your email address?
questions.description_label: This is how we'll contact you.

questions.question: Thanks for applying. If you sound like the person we're looking for, we'll let you know within 7 days. Hope to meet you in person soon.
So, you're interested in volunteering?
questions.description_label: We just need a few pieces of information to get the application process started.

questions.question: What's your first name?
Thanks for that. What's your last name?
We hate to be rude, but how old are you?
questions.description_label: Volunteers must be at least 18 years old. We'll ask for ID later in the process.

questions.question: And what's your academic background?
And your occupation?
What's the best email address for you?
On what days are you available?
And which times work best for you?
Which of the following volunteer activities most interests you?
Okay. Now how would you rate yourself with these..
Build and lead a team?
Stay positive under pressure?
Proactively reach out and help others?
Come up with creative solutions?
Get things done fast?
What previous experience, if any, do you have in volunteering?

Any suggestions for us?

questions.description_label: Let us know when you'll be away and where you're going
